# Dependencies
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# Session files
sessions/*
!sessions/.gitkeep
auth_info_baileys/
baileys_store_multi.json

# Logs
logs/
*.log

# Database
*.db
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# IDE
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# Build outputs
dist/
build/

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage/

# nyc test coverage
.nyc_output

# ESLint cache
.eslintcache

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history

# Output of 'npm pack'
*.tgz

# Yarn Integrity file
.yarn-integrity

# Docker
Dockerfile.dev
docker-compose.override.yml

# Backup files
*.backup
*.bak
